Interface ISandboxFsService

Interface for file system related operations via the sandbox FS API.

Namespace: CodeSandbox.SDK.Net.Interfaces
Assembly: CodeSandbox.SDK.Net.dll
Syntax
public interface ISandboxFsService

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

CopyAsync(FSCopyParams, CancellationToken)

Asynchronously copies files or directories.

Declaration
Task<SuccessResponse<object>> CopyAsync(FSCopyParams request, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
FSCopyParams request

Parameters specifying source and destination for the copy operation.
CancellationToken cancellationToken

A token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Returns
Type Description
Task<SuccessResponse<object>>

A task returning a success response with an optional result object.
